transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes, please.
Executive: Uh, yeah hi sir, very good afternoon. Uh, sir this side Avnish calling from IndiaMART head office branch, right? Uh, actually you are running a company like Pharma India Private Limited, right? And yesterday I got the notification about the video meeting, right? So that is the reason sir, I will call you regarding for the video meeting. So by what time I will schedule for the video meeting sir? I didn't ask for video meeting.
Executive: Uh, sir from your team I got the notification from the video meeting option sir.
Customer: Okay, maybe the staff is on leave, maybe you have to give two days time. Can you schedule a later with you? Okay.
Executive: Uh, sir so I'll do one thing, right? Actually if your staff is clicking on the video meet option, right? So there is one ticket generation, like one complaint is generated, right? For the video meeting. So your staff is not available right now, right? And you are asking me to call after two days, right? So I'll do one thing, I will schedule a call on Friday, right? And currently I am closing this ticket, right? Mark as you need us.
Customer: Do me a favor sir, don't do it on Friday, okay? Yeah. Do it next week 12th of Wednesday.
Executive: No issues sir, I will arrange a video meeting or a call back on Wednesday, right? There is no issues. But I will close your concern, right? And you will get the like feedback option on your primary number which is like ended with 755, right? Start with 89 and ended with 755, right? According to the like you got the call from the IndiaMART head office team, right? Please book yes on the feedback, right? And I will schedule a video meeting on the Wednesday, right? Wednesday by what time sir? Can you give me any any confirmed time?
Customer: 12th November Wednesday 3:30 PM.
Executive: 12th of November?
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Okay, at 3:30 PM, right?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Okay. So you are Mr. V.G. Rao or you are Mr. Subhash sir?
Customer: I am Subhash.
Executive: Okay, you are Subhash. Okay, okay, okay, no issues sir. Is this your WhatsApp number sir? Primary number?
Customer: No, no, no, primary number is my company number.
Executive: Okay, okay, okay. Actually firstly the meri baat hui thi is number pe, toh aapke yaha pe Lakshna mam hua karti thi. Unse mera discussion hota tha but I think shayad woh abhi nahi hai apne yaha pe.
Customer: Nahi woh nahi hai.
Executive: Haan, so that is the basically reason sir mujhe pata nahi chal pata hai ki main matlab kisse baat karu ya kisse connect karu. Kyunki aapke yaha pe koi ek person aisa hoga jo marketing dekhta hoga. Aap saara services use karte ho, hamari premium services run kar rahe ho, right sir? Toh hame bhi thoda sa na feedback wagera services ke chahiye hota hai. Toh koi aisa number aap provide kar sake jo matlab discuss kar sake mere sath mein?
Customer: Karega, mera number likh lo 9600. Just a second sir.
Executive: It's a 9600.
Customer: 909897.
Executive: 9098
Customer: 97.
Executive: 97. Okay, ye aap hi number hai sir?
Customer: Ye mera number hai.
Executive: Okay, ye WhatsApp pe bhi available hoga, right sir?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Okay, no issues. Uh, main aapka number save kar le raha hu apne paas mein aur ye number main aapko apna number de de raha hu sir, personal number mere do hai, ek WhatsApp ka alag hai aur calling ka alag hai, right? Kabhi bhi koi bhi issue aata hai na sir, aap mere ko directly connect kar sakte ho, koi problem nahi rahegi. Jab bhi aapko koi bhi problem aaye, theek hai? Toh main aapse discuss kar sakta hu.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai? Chahe woh buylead se related ho, inquiry se related ho. Abhi kuch feedback aap share kar sakte ho sir services wagera ka kaisa chal raha hai ya kuch bhi aisa?
Customer: Main karta hu sir. Main thoda busy hu, next week thoda free hai, uske time.
Executive: I I am samajh raha hu sir, samajh raha hu. Isi wajah se aapne mere ko next week ka time bhi diya hua hai. I can understand sir. No issues. Uh, main ek kaam kar deta hu sir, aap main head office baitha hu Noida, theek hai? Main aapko ek bari schedule kar deta hu. Main ek kaam karta hu, aapko ek link bhi share kar deta hu video meet ka Wednesday ka 3:30 ka aapke hi number pe, right? Woh jyada better rahega. Taki aapko yaad bhi rahega aur main nahi hoga toh main Tuesday ek bar aapko connect kar lunga for a reminder call ki main Wednesday aapko schedule kar lunga dobara se. I think woh fine rahega na?
Customer: Theek hai sir. Theek hai.
Executive: Aur baki main abhi ye concern close kar de raha hu sir toh ek feedback aayega aapke isi wale number pe 755 wale pe, please usko yes kar dijiyega sir. It's a request.
Customer: Thank you, thank you, thank you.
Executive: Yes, thank you so much Subhash sir. Have a great day sir.
Customer: Thank you.
Executive: Yes.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer didn't ask for a video meeting.

- Wants to know who to contact for marketing.



Resolution:

- Agreed to schedule a video meeting Wednesday 3:30 PM.

- Executive shared his personal contact number.

- Will share a video meet link on customer's number.

- Will connect on Tuesday for a reminder call.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback on services.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, feedback, contact, services
